import React from 'react'; import './Modal.css'; const Modal = props => (

Traverse

Rightclick anywhere to render live feeds/timelapses from that country.
Toggle between search methods in the bottom left settings pane.
Country(default): Searches 50 feeds from random locations in the country.
Local: Searches within a specified radius (1-250)km.
Keep rightclicking if you want to render more feeds.
When you're ready, leftclick on one of the markers to see what's going on.
); export default Modal;
